languages.text: Сам преподобный Иеронимус Скорбный стоял за смертями заключенных в криосклепах членов династии Чорда. Он погубил их, чтобы сделать Вольным Торговцем Инцендию.
Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso himself was behind the deaths of the members of House Chorda preserved inside the cryo-vaults. He murdered them to make Incendia the Rogue Trader.
languages.original_text: Сам преподобный Иеронимус Скорбный стоял за смертями заключенных в криосклепах членов династии Чорда. Он погубил их, чтобы сделать Вольным Торговцем Инцендию.

traits.locale_text: Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso himself was behind the deaths of the members of House Chorda preserved inside the cryo-vaults. He murdered them to make Incendia the Rogue Trader.

languages.text: Le révérend Hiéronymus Doloroso lui-même était à l'origine de la mort des membres de la maison Chorda préservés dans les chambres cryogéniques. Il les a assassinés pour qu'Incendia devienne libre-marchande.
languages.original_text: Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso himself was behind the deaths of the members of House Chorda preserved inside the cryo-vaults. He murdered them to make Incendia the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: Le révérend Hiéronymus Doloroso lui-même était à l'origine de la mort des membres de la maison Chorda préservés dans les chambres cryogéniques. Il les a assassinés pour qu'Incendia devienne libre-marchande.

languages.text: 库尔达家族成员死在了冷冻舱里，而希罗尼穆斯·多罗洛索牧师本人就是这场杀戮的幕后黑手。他下令杀害了那些人，让因森蒂娅成为了行商浪人。
languages.original_text: Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso himself was behind the deaths of the members of House Chorda preserved inside the cryo-vaults. He murdered them to make Incendia the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: 库尔达家族成员死在了冷冻舱里，而希罗尼穆斯·多罗洛索牧师本人就是这场杀戮的幕后黑手。他下令杀害了那些人，让因森蒂娅成为了行商浪人。

languages.text: ヒエロニムス・ドロローソ司祭その人こそが、凍保管庫で保存されていたチョーダ家の人々の死に関わっていた。彼はインセンディアを自由開拓者とするために、彼らを殺害したのだ。
languages.original_text: Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso himself was behind the deaths of the members of House Chorda preserved inside the cryo-vaults. He murdered them to make Incendia the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: ヒエロニムス・ドロローソ司祭その人こそが、凍保管庫で保存されていたチョーダ家の人々の死に関わっていた。彼はインセンディアを自由開拓者とするために、彼らを殺害したのだ。

languages.text: Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso selbst steckte hinter dem Tod der Mitglieder von Haus Chorda in den Cryo-Gräbern. Er hat sie ermordet, um Incendia zur Freihändlerin zu machen.
languages.original_text: Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso himself was behind the deaths of the members of House Chorda preserved inside the cryo-vaults. He murdered them to make Incendia the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso selbst steckte hinter dem Tod der Mitglieder von Haus Chorda in den Cryo-Gräbern. Er hat sie ermordet, um Incendia zur Freihändlerin zu machen.

languages.text: El propio reverendo Hieronymus Doloroso fue el responsable de las muertes de los miembros de la casa Chorda en sus criocámaras. Los asesinó para convertir a Incendia en Comerciante Independiente.
languages.original_text: Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso himself was behind the deaths of the members of House Chorda preserved inside the cryo-vaults. He murdered them to make Incendia the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: El propio reverendo Hieronymus Doloroso fue el responsable de las muertes de los miembros de la casa Chorda en sus criocámaras. Los asesinó para convertir a Incendia en Comerciante Independiente.

languages.text: Kriyomahzenlerde tutulan Chorda Hanesi mensuplarının ölümlerinden bizzat Muhterem Hieronymus Doloroso sorumluymuş. Onları, İncendia'yı Hür Tacir yapabilmek için öldürmüş.
languages.original_text: Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso himself was behind the deaths of the members of House Chorda preserved inside the cryo-vaults. He murdered them to make Incendia the Rogue Trader.
